txt.en: 'Looking for this? The old man has hunted me across the seas and now the land. Alas, it is his end.'
'Hil√¢ma, take the captain's haversack and return to the hideout.'
'You. You have done much for the old captain. Now, like him, you can die.'
'Kill them! Pick their corpses clean and bring me a trinket of their defeat. The rest is yours.'
